message.content: {"id": "6304", "title": "Bug 6304: Cannot synch a .java file and another resource", "description": "", "OB": "When opening the context menu, the Team entry is not present, which prevents synchronization between a .java file and another resource.", "EB": "The Team entry should be visible in the context menu.", "SR": "Ensure that the Team entry is added to the context menu, allowing synchronization between a .java file and another resource."}

origin.input_prompt:

In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
